column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I needed to get my hair cut .
#text=There is a place nearby where they cut hair .
#text=I went there , walked in , and told the woman at the desk my name .
#text=She told me they 'd be ready for me in a few minutes .
#text=I sat down in one of the chairs in the lobby and looked around at the pictures on the walls .
#text=All of them are pictures of men and women showing stylish haircuts .
#text=In a few minutes they called my name and I walked to the rear of the place , where they cut your hair .
#text=I sat in the chair and the woman cutting my hair put a big sheet over me to keep the hair off me as she cut .
#text=She asked me what I wanted done and raised my chair so it was a convenient level for her .
#text=I told her I just wanted my hair trimmed , with long bangs left on the side .
#text=She started cutting my hair , and she talked about a story that was on the news that morning .
#text=When she was done , she picked up a mirror and showed me how my hair looked in the back .
#text=I said it looked good and thanked her .
#text=She took the sheet off me , and I walked over to the desk .
#text=The woman there told me how much I owed .
#text=I paid her , and then I went back and gave a tip to the woman who 'd worked on my hair .
#text=I left the building and went home .
